name: Glitched Dreams
description:
This game was a vague idea. Creating games have removed the limits of bringing imagination to life and experiencing them on our own. 

The game is about a boy who got lost into dream because of a terrible glitch inside his brain. Now he must Collect the fragments and combine them together so that the glitch will be cleared away.

After playing the game make sure you fill the Google Form below.

GOOGLE FORM
